text: masjidul haram (hevat suddha devasthanayen) ha randava tabanu læbu satva kæpayan ema sthanayata langa vimen numbala va vælækvuye pratiksepa kalavun vana ovuhumaya. numbala nodanna visvasa karana pirimin ha visvasa karana kantavan ehi (makkavehi) novi nam, numbala ovun paga damannata avastha tibuni. evita ovun hetuven nodænuvatvama numbalata papayak ætivannata tibuni. (eya makkava tula siti aya aturin) allah abhimata karana ayata ohuge dayava tula ohu ætulat karanu pinisaya. ovun (visvasa kalavun) movungen ven va sitiya nam movun aturin vu pratiksepa kalavunata sæbævin dædi danduvamakin api danduvam karannata tibuni
